# Edward Scott (water polo)

Edward "Ed" Scott  (born 28 May 1988) is a British water polo goalkeeper. At the 2012 Summer Olympics, he competed for the Great Britain men's national water polo team in the men's event. He is 6 ft 5 inches tall. He played in the Spanish Divisi√≥n De Honor for CE Mediterrani.
Scott continued to play the game at the highest level, competing for City of Manchester.
